sequence:
A Glorious Interlude

<size=45>Chapter 7 - The Glory She's Named For Pt. 2</size>

scripts.say: As she saw it, the most important thing was for her to be the bringer of victory, the "Glorious" that everyone could depend on. But—
“At least stop fronting when I'm alone with the Commander.” You mean...
You think I can't become your pride, your glory, then...?
I shine my glory before the others, but when I'm with you, I don't have to...?
I took her hand and pulled her to the seat next to me.
The truth was, I had sent a message off to the others that they should come over to help out once they finished their meeting.
That means, when I'm with the Commander, I can be weak, I can be vulnerable, I can be unreliable, I can pout—
This way, I can keep shining my glory before all the others—
Can a clumsy and careless Glorious still be the Commander's glory?
There was a trembling in Glorious's voice.
I understand. It is an order from the Commander, after all—
She relaxed her grip on my hand and on my shoulder I felt the weight of a young girl.
Orders received, Commander. ... As your glory, I-I'm going to indulge myself for a bit.
Do you mind... if I take a little rest... Before the others get here?
The soft sounds of her peaceful sleep echoed throughout the empty workshop…
